alert.note: Alert for Conway; Dallas; Faulkner; Garland; Grant; Hot Spring; Jefferson; Perry; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 1:22AM CDT until June 18 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Perry County in central Arkansas... Grant County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Conway County in central Arkansas... Southwestern Faulkner County in central Arkansas... Northwestern Dallas County in southwestern Arkansas... Northwestern Jefferson County in southeastern Arkansas... Garland County in central Arkansas... Saline County in central Arkansas... Hot Spring County in southwestern Arkansas... Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 200 AM CDT. * At 121 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles north of Jessieville to near Hot Springs Village to Lonsdale to 7 miles south of Malvern, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Conway... Hot Springs... Benton... West Little Rock... Maumelle... Bryant... Hot Springs Village... Malvern... Downtown Little Rock... Morrilton... Sheridan... Perryville... North Little Rock Airport... Southwest Little Rock... Haskell... Shannon Hills... Mayflower... Wrightsville... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Conway; Dallas; Faulkner; Garland; Grant; Hot Spring; Jefferson; Perry; Pulaski; Saline
